snippet.title: Shiawase no Uta (Magical Melody JP) - Meeting Nina and Liz
snippet.description:
This is a video from March 2005 of Bokujou Monogatari: Shiawase no Uta for Nintendo Gamecube. In this video the protagonists first meets the flowershop owner, Liz, and then her daughter, Nina.

The original Shiawase no Uta was not translated into English. A second version was released, Shiawase no Uta For World, which included quality changes such as making the rival farmer a marriage candidate and fixing a game-breaking bug. For World was eventually localized as Harvest Moon: Magical Melody.
